title: Karen Pence Visits New Art Therapy Program at Riley – The White House
content:
Healthcare	

September 20, 2018
1 minute read

						Karen Pence							
Second LadyThis week, I visited Riley Children’s Health in Indianapolis and participated in syringe painting with art therapy patients. We made a colorful mess that turned into canvas prints and a cool design on my smock. — Second Lady Karen PenceKaren Pence visits new art therapy program at Riley
